conbody.p: error messagesaccessingtroubleshootingaccessing error messagesThe provides different types of information in different locations. When you encounter an error or just want some information, go to the appropriate location.

dlentry.dd:
The console provides guidance and error details in the UI as follows:
Required properties are outlined in green.
Required properties that are not defined ar outlined in red.
All issues captured by implicit validation display in the Issues list, accessible through the Issues icon: .
In addition, an issue icon displays at the stage where the issue occurs or on the canvas for pipeline configuration issues.
You can view error information when you monitor a running pipeline. The pipeline displays error record counts for each stage that generates error records.
On the Errors tab, you can view error record statistics and the latest set of error records with error messages.

dd.note: This information becomes unavailable when you stop the pipeline. To preserve information about error records, use the Error Records pipeline property to save error records.

dlentry.dd:
When you use the Error Records pipeline property to save error records, the saves error records and related information. The following fields can help you determine the problem that occurred:
errorStage - The stage in the pipeline that generated the error.
errorCode - The error code associated with the error message.
errorMessage - The text of the error message.
You can view information and errors related to the general functionality in the log. (Administration > Logs.)
